name: CardRush
description:
For the 41th Ludum Dare we combined a plattformer with a card game to make out game CardRush. Race through Jump and Run Levels against enemy controlled by our ai, wich is not very clever. To finish the rave first you can use various cards to boost your self or to debuff our oponent. Can you make it through the more or less difficult levels and become the champion?

Information to the Game:

  • Engine - Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphic Editor - Pyxel Edit
  • Game made by 2 People in 72 Hour, who had nearly no knowledge about Game Maker

The biggest problem was the enemy, which has an simple ai that could be better and will become better in the future. Also we want to add more cards, a deck builder, more maps and more diverse enemy types.

Have fun with our game!
